title: The Bank and My Accounts

sections.title: Bank Vocabulary
sections.content:
Basic words for the banking environment.

- **Bank**: Banco
- **Branch**: Sucursal / Oficina
- **ATM**: Cajero automático
- **Counter**: Mostrador / Ventanilla
- **Manager**: Gerente
- **Customer**: Cliente
- **Account**: Cuenta

sections.title: Modern Banks: Neobanks
sections.content:
A **Neobank** is a bank on your phone. It has no physical branch.

- **App**: Aplicación
- **Mobile**: Móvil
- **No paper**: Sin papel
- **Fast**: Rápido

### Traditional vs. Neobank
```mermaid
graph TD
    A[Traditional Bank] --> B[Physical Branch]
    C[Neobank] --> D[Mobile App]
```

sections.title: Personal and Possessive Pronouns
sections.content:
We use pronouns to talk about people and ownership.

**Personal Pronouns (Subject):**
- **I** (Yo), **You** (Tú), **He** (Él), **She** (Ella), **It** (Ello), **We** (Nosotros), **They** (Ellos).

**Possessive Adjectives:**
- **My** (Mi), **Your** (Tu), **His** (Su - de él), **Her** (Su - de ella), **Its** (Su - de cosa), **Our** (Nuestro), **Their** (Su - de ellos).

Examples:
- **My** account is new. (Mi cuenta es nueva)
- **His** bank is an app. (Su banco es una aplicación)
- **Our** manager is helpful. (Nuestro gerente es servicial)
